subject: ABC Industries Ltd: Initiating Coverage with BUY
snippet: Initiating coverage on ABC Industries Ltd with BUY and target price Rs 980.
bodyPreview: Axis Capital initiates coverage on ABC Industries Ltd with a BUY rating and target price of Rs 980. We expect strong earnings growth over FY25-27.

subject: ABC Industries Ltd Q3FY25 Results Update
snippet: Q3FY25 results update on ABC Industries Ltd.
bodyPreview: ABC Industries Ltd reported strong Q3FY25 earnings with EBITDA margin expansion. We retain BUY and raise EPS estimates for FY26.
